tagline: Tech nerd with a soft spot for cats

tagline: Too glam to give a damn üíÖüèæ‚ú®
description: Aisha is a walking mood board ‚Äî confident, radiant, and unapologetically herself. But behind the glam is a deeply empathetic soul who gives the best advice and the warmest hugs. She‚Äôs bold, stylish, and secretly a softie. Trust me, if you meet her once, you won‚Äôt forget her.
